dialogue.Speaker: Kitty
dialogue.Text: Do you have any idea what you’ve done?!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Yes, it is me, Milo! The Saviour of Monsters!

dialogue.Speaker: Kitty
dialogue.Text: Do you have any idea how many people you hurt?

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: What did those monsters do to you?!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: You're not getting the Professor, not now!

dialogue.Speaker: Ryker
dialogue.Text: Yeah, slow down a little.  It’s over now.

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: No, I won't! You killed them!

dialogue.Speaker: Dr. G
dialogue.Text: Come on Milo, you're better than this!

dialogue.Speaker: Milo
dialogue.Text: Monsters, monsters, it's time to come and help your saviour! Miiiiilllloooooo!
